faqData.question: How is an ERP system beneficial for garment manufacturers?
faqData.answer: An ERP system manages style variations, automates production planning, controls fabric and trim inventory, simplifies order processing, and ensures on-time delivery across seasons.

faqData.question: Who can use this ERP system in the apparel industry?
faqData.answer: This ERP solution is ideal for garment manufacturers, fashion brands, exporters, and wholesalers. It offers modules for design, merchandising, order tracking, inventory, and dispatch.

faqData.question: Can I customize the ERP according to my garment business needs?
faqData.answer: Yes. The system is modular and fully customizable, allowing you to configure workflows, reports, size/color matrices, and production stages based on your operations.
